TopicTitle: Ridiculous reasons why atheists are wrong.

Articles.Content:
I just found this website: http://www.landoverbaptist.net/showthread.php?t=14025

It's ridiculous. The reasons why they think atheists are wrong are terrible.

They even assume that all atheists believe in the Big Bang. Tell me what you think about this!

I just found this website: http://www.landoverbaptist.net/showthread.php?t=14025

It's ridiculous. The reasons why they think atheists are wrong are terrible.

They even assume that all atheists believe in the Big Bang. Tell me what you think about this!

I think that because of the topic there is a 99% probability that this thread will be locked before it hits 10 pages. In my experience things like this just end up turning into arguments.

I avoid those forums as it lowers everones intelligence and it is borderline troll posting it here, but i have to say there is an incredulous level of delusion on that website, and i do respect christians and aetheist view points.
The KSP forums are not the place to discuss such matters, so please find a more appropriate forum off site.
